Beast Wars happened prior to the RPGs events. So we are after Beast Wars bu=
t well before the G1s activate in the original TF. It's probably 30 to 40 y=
ears after BW.

--- On Fri, 7/18/08, jdmyemail <jdmyemail@...> wrote:=


From: jdmyemail <jdmyemail@...>
Subject: Re: OOC Info
To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com
Date: Friday, July 18, 2008, 7:35 PM






ok, so I just read=
 all the story information on the wiki page, but I'm still fuzzy on some 
d=
etails about the history and setting...

This takes place on Earth, and eve=
rything in the history section happened here before the 
story - but where =
do the events of Beast Wars fit in?
